value:
$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Thank you, Peony. With your help,
it seems everyone has recovered
their memories...$k$pOur memories of you, and of
$Nu as well...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Of course! I was happy to help!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Now, what was it you said about
Dream-King Freyr?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Right... He was taken! They took him
to Dökkálfheimr, the nightmare realm.$k$pAnd that's where Dream-King Freyr's
sister, Lady Freyja, is... And if SHE'S
involved, there's sure to be trouble.$k$pThe Waking Dream... It's happening.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|What's that, the "Waking Dream"?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|The dream realm influencing other
worlds. We had already seen dreams
crossing over into this world...$k$pAnd now the dökkálfr nightmares
have come flooding in!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|So, that's the situation, then.
In that case, then Askr is still
under threat...$k$pHow can we return everything
to normal?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|We must go to Dökkálfheimr and
save Dream-King Freyr. It's our
one and only hope!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|All right! Then let's— Actually, how
do we get to Dökkálfheimr?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Hmmm... HMMM... Oh!
I have an idea!$k$pWe can use the power of the
ljósálfar here in this world to
help us get to Dökkálfheimr!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|There are...ljósálfar in Askr?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Yes! Even awake, there are some
who still dream... You've heard of
that, haven't you? ..."Daydreaming"?$k$pWe'll go find Mirabilis. She's a friend
of mine—and a TRUE daydreamer!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Askr...will be ended...$k$pFinished...finished...
FINISHED...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|I've...seen this before... In a dream.
This is...the Princess Veronica from
my nightmares!$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|On your guard, everyone! The
enemy is upon us!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|The nightmare is fading away!$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|...Hey.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what?! The nightmare's back!$k$p$SbpBGM_EVENT_SERIOUS_02,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face_Anger|Nightmare? How rude.$k$pWe may be enemies, but...
Nightmare?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|...Don't tell me. You're the REAL
Princess Veronica?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Yes. Of course. Do I appear not
real in some way?$k$p...Or is it that you know something
I do not? ...What is it? Tell me.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|All right, fine. Peony, if you would,
please give her the details...$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Ah! I guess it's my time to shine.
I love shining!$k$pEr... Hi! I'm Peony. I'm a ljósálfr
from Ljósálfheimr! Nice to meet
you...Veronica, was it?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|A...what?$k$pI cannot understand a word she says.
Such strange sounds...and behavior.
...Her outfit is odd as well.$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face_Pain|Wh-what a mean little girl! You are
so young, yet...have you lost your
heart for dreaming?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|My heart for dreaming... Let's come
back to that. For now, just fill me in
on the current situation.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Hmmm...$k$pSo, we should be able to find a
ljósálfr named Mirabilis here?$k$p$WmMPID_神階ピアニー,ch00_23_Peony_F_Normal,Face|Right! Well...over there. In that
huuuge forest!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Hm... If the forest's edge is any
indication, the whole area is
covered in thick mist.$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|Right, then. I will join you.$k$pMy brother will likely be
there as well...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Zacharias will be there? How do
you know that?$k$p$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|He went with Xander on a long
journey. I haven't seen either of
them for quite some time...$k$pBut I heard someone who looks like
my brother was seen here.$k$pHe must have finally come home.
I am going to welcome him back.$k$p$Sbs150|
